snippet: President Abdelaziz Bouteflika returned home on Tuesday after 80 days of treatment in France for a stroke.
abstract: Algeria's Pres Abdelaziz Bouteflika returns home after 80 days of treatment in France for stroke, stay that delayed many government decisions and raised questions about his ability to lead.
lead_paragraph: President Abdelaziz Bouteflika returned home on Tuesday after 80 days of treatment in France for a stroke.
